about.description:
FEniCS is a collection of free software for automated, efficient solution of differential equations
(<http://fenicsproject.org>). It provides C++ and Python interfaces, and creates effecient solvers via
expression of finite variational statements in a domain-specific language that are transformed and
just-in-time compiled into efficient implementations.
about.summary: FEniCS is a collection of free software for automated, efficient solution of differential equations

name: fenics
raw_recipe:
# This file created by conda-build 3.20.5
# ------------------------------------------------

package:
    name: fenics
    version: 2019.1.0
source:
    -   folder: dijitso
        sha256: eaa45eec4457f3f865d72a926b7cba86df089410e78de04cd89b15bb405e8fd9
        url: https://bitbucket.org/fenics-project/dijitso/downloads/dijitso-2019.1.0.tar.gz
    -   folder: ffc
        patches:
            - ufc-include-path.patch
        sha256: 4ff821a234869d8b9aaf8c5d7f617d42f9c134a2529e76c9519b681dff35affd
        url: https://bitbucket.org/fenics-project/ffc/downloads/ffc-2019.1.0.tar.gz
    -   folder: fiat
        sha256: 341a1046cbe0f5f2eb26630c2f71f378b0dca51daf9892a54a2ff193970371e9
        url: https://bitbucket.org/fenics-project/fiat/downloads/fiat-2019.1.0.tar.gz
    -   folder: ufl
        sha256: 213a56bfa2edb0365909fa6f110f970e582b10a3f5f1fd9a0e85254f1eefaa11
        url: https://bitbucket.org/fenics-project/ufl/downloads/ufl-2019.1.0.tar.gz
    -   folder: dolfin
        patches:
            - boost.patch
        sha256: 61abdcdb13684ba2a3ba4afb7ea6c7907aa0896a46439d3af7e8848483d4392f
        url: https://bitbucket.org/fenics-project/dolfin/downloads/dolfin-2019.1.0.post0.tar.gz
build:
    number: 13
    script: echo 1
    string: py38h53f7636_13
requirements:
    host:
        - ca-certificates 2020.6.20 hecda079_0
        - libcxx 11.0.0 h439d374_0
        - libffi 3.2.1 hb1e8313_1007
        - ncurses 6.2 hb1e8313_2
        - openssl 1.1.1h haf1e3a3_0
        - python 3.8.6 hcfdab8c_0_cpython
        - python_abi 3.8 1_cp38
        - readline 8.0 h0678c8f_2
        - sqlite 3.33.0 h960bd1c_1
        - tk 8.6.10 hb0a8c7a_1
        - xz 5.2.5 haf1e3a3_1
        - zlib 1.2.11 h7795811_1010
    run:
        - fenics-dijitso ==2019.1.0
        - fenics-dolfin 2019.1.0 py38hd425eab_13
        - fenics-ffc ==2019.1.0
        - fenics-fiat ==2019.1.0
        - fenics-ufl ==2019.1.0
        - hdf5 * mpi_mpich_*
        - python >=3.8,<3.9.0a0
        - python_abi 3.8.* *_cp38
test:
    imports:
        - dolfin
about:
    description: 'FEniCS is a collection of free software for automated, efficient
        solution of differential equations

        (<http://fenicsproject.org>). It provides C++ and Python interfaces, and creates
        effecient solvers via

        expression of finite variational statements in a domain-specific language
        that are transformed and

        just-in-time compiled into efficient implementations.

        '
    dev_url: https://bitbucket.org/fenics-project/
    doc_url: http://fenics.readthedocs.io/
    home: http://www.fenicsproject.org
    license: LGPL 3.0
    license_file: dolfin/COPYING.LESSER
    summary: FEniCS is a collection of free software for automated, efficient solution
        of differential equations
extra:
    copy_test_source_files: true
    final: true
    recipe-maintainers:
        - garth-wells
        - jan-janssen
        - johannesring
        - mikaem
        - minrk
